briefdescription.para: Copies input data to output and executes in-place if input/output are different.
Allocate workspace memory for FFTW operations.
Frees allocated workspace pointers using MHO_FFTWTypes free_func.
Destroys all initialized FFTW plans and sets them to NULL.
Checks if two pointers have the same memory alignment.

simplesect.para: Boolean indicating whether pointers have the same alignment
